ai-patthana13.12:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma, namely, Tissaka,
ai-patthana13.12:1.1_0: Also the teaching doesn’t give rise to the cause or condition for the sake of example.
ai-patthana13.12:1.1_1: We have no cause or conditioned by limited thoughts.
ai-patthana13.12:1.1_2: Also there is no cause or condition for limitedness.
ai-patthana13.12:1.1_3: There are no limitedness that gives rise to limitedness, and the precincts modes.
ai-patthana13.12:1.1_4: There is no limited teaching, or conditioned by conditions, and the necessary for the sake of a limited period.
ai-patthana13.12:2.1_0: Maintain the Teaching arises in someone who does not give rise to greatness cause or condition.
ai-patthana13.12:2.1_1: expansive teaching doesn’t give rise to the cause,
ai-patthana13.12:2.1_2: Excellent state gives rise to the cause of expansive conditions.
ai-patthana13.12:2.1_4: Indeed he does not give rise to the finest states, and the conditions for the sake of embankment.
ai-patthana13.12:3.1_0: Abandoning the teaching doesn’t give rise to limitless thoughts.
ai-patthana13.12:3.1_1: A teaching doesn’t give rise to the cause or condition for the sake of excellence.
ai-patthana13.12:3.1_2: One gives rise to unlimitedness, and has no cause or condition.
ai-patthana13.12:3.1_3: There is no limitless thought, or intentence to the teaching, and there are no cause or condition.
ai-patthana13.12:3.1_4: thoughts that are limitless, and there are no cause or condition.
ai-patthana13.12:4.1_0: Also there is no limitless teaching, and there is no cause or condition for the sake of sacrifice.
ai-patthana13.12:4.1_1: A limitless teaching gives rise to limitlessness causes and conditions.
ai-patthana13.12:4.1_2: There are limitlessness that is limitless, and there are no cause or condition for the sake of embodiment.
ai-patthana13.12:5.1_1: Also there is no cause or reason for this.
ai-patthana13.12:5.1_3: Times for the sake of a very limited exceedingly (for them), without a cause or condition.
ai-patthana13.12:5.1_4: Talking is limited on the extent of the teaching, and the necessary for the sake of a limited period.
ai-patthana13.12:5.1_5: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana13.12:6.1_0: ... twenty-four grounds for a single object ...
ai-patthana13.12:6.1_1: And each of the sixteenth year ...
